name: Discount for WooCommerce
author: Alexander Butyuhin

sections.description:
Easily make discount for WooCommerce for all users / just for logged in users / different % for all and logged in users. In easy way with small plugin your site will be fast and it take you just few seconds to do it.

Features

  • Make % discount for logged in users. In easy way from a WordPress Dashboard
  • Make % discount for all users
  • Make different % dicount for all and logged in users

Thank you

Thank you, for using my plugin. If you like this plugin, you can buy me a cup of coffe.
sections.installation:
1. Upload discount-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to “WooCommerce” -> “Discount Price” and change “Discount” value
  4. Have a fun!

Translations

You can translate discount-for-woocommerce on translate.wordpress.org.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Added discount for all users

1.0.1

  • Fix error with wp_get_current_user

1.0

  • Initial release
